rooms.description: A welcoming entry space with minimalistic Kerala-style decor and natural ventilation ensuring adherence to Vastu principles.
Spacious area featuring traditional wood carvings, low windows for natural light in accordance with Vastu guidelines, and open spaces for family gatherings.
A well-lit dining space integrated within the living area, oriented towards the east to invite positive energy.
Dedicated workspace designed with ample natural light from north-facing windows for productivity and peace of mind.
Functional kitchen area with a Kerala-style layout emphasizing open ventilation, and positioned away from the main living areas to maintain energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.
A compact guest bathroom with essential fixtures designed for convenience and comfort.

openings.description: South-facing entrance to ensure proper ingress of positive energy in line with Vastu practices.
Windowed door leading to a small patio for natural ventilation and light, placed according to traditional layout principles.
